Strategic UX UI designer
I’m Amanda, a designer with over three years of experience delivering accessible and high-performance digital experiences that resonate with diverse audiences.
Featured Work

What I Do
My design approach is iterative and flexible, adaptable to each project and scopes of work. I can run UX research, strategy, UI design, prototyping and more involving the design process.
Website
Whether you need a more engaging and user-friendly website or want to increase its accessibility, I’ll make sure to bring your idea to life.
